description.value:
Sought after by many unscrupulous bards, this instrument is surprisingly light and easy to carry, but also empowered with a number of spells carefully selected to help with fooling others or making a hasty retreat. While playing the mandolin, you gain a +1 item bonus to Deception and Performance checks.

Activate1 envision

Effect You change the instrument's color and shape to one you prefer, and you can turn it into a different handheld string instrument that takes two hands to play.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Prestidigitation]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Item Facade], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ventriloquism]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Creature], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Invisibility], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mirror Image]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantom Prison], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sculpt Sound]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
